Hot Chocolate
200ml milk
0.2g salt
tonka
8g raw brown sugar
40ml cream
30g dark chocolate (70% lindt, or coop fleur de sel 72%)
10ml vanilla rum
  1. Heat the milk with the salt, tonka, and the sugar until near boiling
  2. Chop the chocolate, add to the milk and heat until it boils and starts foaming up the saucepan. Allow it to foam for around 30 seconds until it appears to thicken, to get some bubbles into the hot chocolate
  3. Put the vanilla and cream in a mug and pour the chocolate over
